title: Mercy Corps
subtitle:
Today, we’re celebrating #WomenHumanitarians who make our work possible. Hemeda is on our team in Jordan. She helps young #refugees like Amani (pictured) heal from trauma.

title: Kent Page
subtitle:

title: Send Relief
subtitle:
We are so thankful for the work of the Refugee Sewing Society in Clarkston, Ga. #Refugees are the artisans, and are given the chance to earn an income, all while experiencing God's hope!

Support them as they adapt to their new home through @WorldCrafts: https://bit.ly/33chRcL pic.twitter.com/SA542LoujG
